item.title: How to install MozillaVPN Client on Debian 11 (Bullseye)
item.description: Introduction MozillaVPN’s README is already quite good, but is lacking a few Debian specific packages. MozillaVPN is built with Qt, so it’s moments like these when you appreciate good distributions cause compiling Qt is a nightmare Approach Install and setup Qt5 sudo apt install qtdeclarative5-dev \ libqt5networkauth5-dev \ libqt5websockets5-dev \ libqt5charts5-dev \ qtbase5-dev \ qtchooser \ qt5-qmake \ qtbase5-dev-tools \ qttools5-dev \ qml-module-qtcharts \ qml-module-qtgraphicaleffects \ qml-module-qtquick-controls \ qml-module-qtquick-controls2 \ qml-module-qtquick-extras \ qml-module-qtquick-layouts \ qml-module-qtquick-window2 \ qml-module-qtquick2 \ qml-module-qtqml-models2 qml-module-qtqml \ vim ~/.
